title: Research Intern - IIT Madras ICCW
short_description: Improved VayuJal atmospheric water generator efficiency by 18% through sensor calibration optimization
full_description: Conducted lab research across 50+ experimental conditions and improved the efficiency of the VayuJal atmospheric water generator by 18% through sensor calibration optimization. Studied ML models to predict water contamination levels based on air quality. Solution adopted by two environmental startups. Presented findings to IIT professors.
